name: Delusion Rift
description:
Your grappling hook is infused with some kind of delusion magic. Using the hook will transform the entire world into a darker more dangerous plane of existence.

Although the other plane has it's dangers, its still not real at the end of the day.

How to play

  • AD/left+right to move
  • space to jump
  • left click to grapple
  • right click to shoot
  • Gain points by killing the delusion enemies.
  • Score as many points as possible.
